sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
The loyal addresse of the gentry of Gloucestershire. To the Kings most Excellent Majesty. Herbert of Cherbury, Edward Herbert, Baron, ca. 1633-1678.
1 sheet ([1] p.)
Printed for Humphrey Tuckey, at the black-spread Eagle in Fleet-street, over against St. Dunstans Church, London : 1660.
Signed: Lord Herbert [and 88 others]. Annotation on Thomason copy: "June 21". Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======

Signed: Lord Herbert [and 88 others]. Annotation on Thomason copy: "June 21". Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
Humphrey Tuckey
the black-spread Eagle in Fleet-street, over against St. Dunstans Church
